tool_description: Generates detailed specifications for fire suppression system components including sprinklers, piping, valves, and control systems based on design requirements.

temperature_rating.description: Required temperature rating for sprinklers in degrees Fahrenheit

error_messages: Unsupported system type: System type must be from approved fire suppression categories.
Invalid hazard level: Must be Light, Ordinary I, Ordinary II, Extra I, or Extra II.
Invalid temperature rating: Must be between 135 and 500 degrees Fahrenheit.
usage: Specify the system type and hazard level, optionally provide temperature rating. The tool will generate comprehensive component specifications for procurement and installation.

pipe_specifications.description: Piping system specifications including materials and sizes
